architecturalDecision.title: Use Attributes for Architectural Decision Records
architecturalDecision.contents: Architectural Decision Records (ADR) can be useful in determining why a piece of software is the way it is. While these type of documents can live anywhere, an Attribute in your codebase can be a good place to store this info. For more information, please check out the README in this repo or at https://github.com/cspray/architectural-decision
